textBox.richText: Do you see the similarity here?  Most webcams (especially Logitech ones) resemble the orb-like HAL 9000 computer eye from the movie 2001: Space Odyssey by Arthur C. Clarke (who coincidentally died last week at the ripe old age of 90). In the back of my mind, I am always worried that when I sit down and open my Web browser I will hear “I’m sorry, but I can’t do that Dave.” in that calm psychotic computer voice......
